revised_title: On the Modifications of the First and Second Visceral Archs: A Study of Homologies in Auditory Ossicles
tldr: The author examines the modifications of the first and second visceral arches in various elasmobranch fish species, focusing on the homologies of the auditory ossicles. The study provides insights into the evolution of these structures and their role in the development of higher elasmobranch conditions.
